long_description: This blissful pillow with eco-friendly filling cradles your neck and head for relaxing yet firm support while traveling via airplane, train or car. Soft, luxurious furry cover feels nice next to your skin; rear zipper allows cover to be removed for washing. Zippered inner liner allows you to adjust the fullness by removing some of the organic premium millet hull filling. Machine wash for easy care.
short_description: This blissful pillow with eco-friendly filling cradles your neck and head for relaxing yet firm support while traveling via airplane, train or car.
